dc.title: Home Page - The Office of Minority Health
dc.description: The Office of Minority Health advises the Secretary and the OPHS on public health issues affecting American Indians, and Alaska Natives, Asian Americans, Native Hawaiians and other Pacific Islanders, Blacks/African Americans, and Hispanics/Latinos. Its mission is to improve the health of racial and ethnic populations through the development of effective health policies and programs that help to eliminate disparities in health.
